University of Cincinnati.title: Graduate Assistant (Imaging and Security Remediaton) - DTS CEAS IT
responsibilities: Provided comprehensive desktop support to university faculty and staff, ensuring the seamless installation and configuration of security tools across diverse operating systems including Mac, Windows, and Linux.
Identified and resolved security vulnerabilities in computer hardware, software, and peripherals through systematic troubleshooting and meticulous testing of remediation solutions.
Implemented robust measures to eradicate spyware, adware, and viruses, safeguarding the integrity of university systems and data.
Maintained meticulous documentation for all hardware and software installations, configurations, and inventory, ensuring streamlined operations and compliance.
Managed user accounts within Active Directory on Windows Server, overseeing account creation, configuration, and modification to uphold security protocols and facilitate user access.

University of Cincinnati.title: Desk Assistant - University Housing
responsibilities: Manage interactions with parents, resident advisors, and serve as a contact point for staff.
Inventory management for available resources with allocation to students.
Overlook student check-in/check-out procedures and assist with lockouts
Report security violations and respond to emergencies.
Document information accurately, attend meetings, and perform additional duties as assigned.
Foster an inclusive community in the residence halls.

Accenture.title: Application Development Analyst / Software Engineer
responsibilities: Manage interactions with parents, resident advisors, and others as first point of contact.
Inventory management for available resources with allocation to students.

Accenture.title: Application Development Associate / Associate Software Engineer
responsibilities: Cross Trained on Azure Cloud Fundamentals
